MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: Visual Analogue Scale (VAS) and Council of Nutrition Appetite Questionnaire (CNAQ) for appetite assessment

first_scan_start.Description: Start time of first scan. Displayed as HH:MM

first_scan_end.Description: End time of first scan. Displayed as HH:MM

second_scan_start.Description: Start time of second scan. Displayed as HH:MM

second_scan_end.Description: End time of Second scan. Displayed as HH:MM

VAS1_time.Description: Start time of the VAS (part 1) being administered, conducted under the fasting condition. Displayed as HH:MM

VAS1_1.Description: Score for question 1 of VAS (part 1), conducted under the fasting condition. Range: 0-100

VAS1_2.Description: Score for question 2 of VAS (part 1), conducted under the fasting condition. Range: 0-100

VAS1_3.Description: Score for question 3 of VAS (part 1), conducted under the fasting condition. Range: 0-100

VAS1_4.Description: Score for question 4 of VAS (part 1), conducted under the fasting condition. Range: 0-100

VAS1_5.Description: Score for question 5 of VAS (part 1), conducted under the fasting condition. Range: 0-100

palatability_time.Description: Start time of the VAS (part 2) being administered, conducted following the consumption of a liquid mixed meal (post-prandial). Displayed as HH:MM

palatability_1.Description: Score for question 1 of VAS (part 2), conducted under the post-prandial condition. Range: 0-100

palatability_2.Description: Score for question 2 of VAS (part 2), conducted under the post-prandial condition. Range: 0-100

palatability_3.Description: Score for question 3 of VAS (part 2), conducted under the post-prandial condition. Range: 0-100

palatability_4.Description: Score for question 4 of VAS (part 2), conducted under the post-prandial condition. Range: 0-100

palatability_5.Description: Score for question 5 of VAS (part 2), conducted under the post-prandial condition. Range: 0-100

VAS2_time.Description: Start time of the VAS (part 1) being administered, conducted under the post-prandial condition. Displayed as HH:MM

VAS2_1.Description: Score for question 1 of VAS (part 1), conducted under the post-prandial condition. Range: 0-100

VAS2_2.Description: Score for question 2 of VAS (part 1), conducted under the post-prandial condition. Range: 0-100

VAS2_3.Description: Score for question 3 of VAS (part 1), conducted under the post-prandial condition. Range: 0-100

VAS2_4.Description: Score for question 4 of VAS (part 1), conducted under the post-prandial condition. Range: 0-100

VAS2_5.Description: Score for question 5 of VAS (part 1), conducted under the post-prandial condition. Range: 0-100

VAS3_time.Description: Start time of the VAS (part 1) being administered, conducted following the completion of the second scan. Displayed as HH:MM

VAS3_1.Description: Score for question 1 of VAS (part 1), conducted following the completion of the second scan. Range: 0-100

VAS3_2.Description: Score for question 2 of VAS (part 1), conducted following the completion of the second scan. Range: 0-100

VAS3_3.Description: Score for question 3 of VAS (part 1), conducted following the completion of the second scan. Range: 0-100

VAS3_4.Description: Score for question 4 of VAS (part 1), conducted following the completion of the second scan. Range: 0-100

VAS3_5.Description: Score for question 5 of VAS (part 1), conducted following the completion of the second scan. Range: 0-100

CNAQ_1.Description: Score for question 1 of the CNAQ. Range: 0-5

CNAQ_2.Description: Score for question 2 of the CNAQ. Range: 0-5

CNAQ_3.Description: Score for question 3 of the CNAQ. Range: 0-5

CNAQ_4.Description: Score for question 4 of the CNAQ. Range: 0-5

CNAQ_5.Description: Score for question 5 of the CNAQ. Range: 0-5

CNAQ_6.Description: Score for question 6 of the CNAQ. Range: 0-5

CNAQ_7.Description: Score for question 7 of the CNAQ. Range: 0-5

CNAQ_8.Description: Score for question 8 of the CNAQ. Range: 0-5

CNAQ_total.Description: Total score for the CNAQ. Range: 0-40
